perturbation.original_text:
2.1 License Grant and Restrictions.
(i) License Grant. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein, World Book hereby grants to HSWI, a perpetual, irrevocable limited license to use, copy, store, archive, distribute,
transmit, modify (subject to Section 2.1(iv)), and Display the Content, Images and Affinities in whole or in part, only on the HSWI Websites or in promotions in any media for the HSWI Websites. The license
to each component of the Content, Images and Affinities shall be subject to the term and exclusivity
provisions set forth in this Section 2. The license to each component of the Content, Images and
Affinities shall be supplemented by any additional license rights in this Section 2, and in the event of
any conflict with this Section 2.1 such other additional license rights in this Section 2 shall prevail.
perturbation.changed_text:
2.1 License Grant and Restrictions.
(i) License Grant. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein, World Book hereby grants to HSWI, a limited license to use, copy, store, archive, distribute,
transmit, modify (subject to Section 2.1(iv)), and Display the Content, Images and Affinities in whole or in part, only on the HSWI Websites or in promotions in any media for the HSWI Websites. The license
to each component of the Content, Images and Affinities shall be subject to the term and exclusivity
provisions set forth in this Section 2. The license to each component of the Content, Images and
Affinities shall be supplemented by any additional license rights in this Section 2, and in the event of
any conflict with this Section 2.1 such other additional license rights in this Section 2 shall prevail. This license shall be for a term of one year, renewable annually by mutual written agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants a 'perpetual, irrevocable' license. The modified text introduces a contradictory term of 'one year, renewable annually,' removing the perpetual and irrevocable nature of the license and creating uncertainty about the duration of rights granted.

perturbation.original_text:
7.6 The restrictions on use and disclosure of Confidential Information under this Section 7 shall remain
in effect [*] ([*]) years following disclosure of the Confidential InformationÍ¾ provided, however, for trade secrets
such restrictions shall continue for so long as such information is deemed a trade secret under applicable law.
perturbation.changed_text:
7.6 The restrictions on use and disclosure of Confidential Information under this Section 7 shall remain
in effect [*] ([*]) years following disclosure of the Confidential Information. These restrictions shall automatically terminate upon the termination of this agreement, regardless of whether the information is deemed a trade secret or not.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that restrictions on trade secrets last as long as the information qualifies as a trade secret. The altered text adds that all restrictions end upon termination of the agreement, contradicting the trade secret clause and creating uncertainty about confidentiality.

perturbation.original_text:
11.6 Governing Law. This Agreement, the rights and obligations of the parties hereto, and any claims
or disputes thereto, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York
without reference to conflict of law principles. Venue for any proceedings not subject to arbitration under this
Agreement shall be in the state and federal courts located in New York, New York.
perturbation.changed_text:
11.6 Governing Law. This Agreement, the rights and obligations of the parties hereto, and any claims
or disputes thereto, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York
without reference to conflict of law principles. Venue for any proceedings not subject to arbitration under this
Agreement shall be in the state and federal courts located in Atlanta, Georgia.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies New York as the venue for legal proceedings. The modified text changes the venue to Atlanta, Georgia, directly contradicting the original clause and creating confusion about where legal disputes should be resolved.
